name: Button Game: Last Chance to Not Get Exploded
name_original: Button Game: Last Chance to Not Get Exploded
description:
MADE FOR TRIJAM #201:

A one-button multiplayer game where you have one chance to hit a button that will save you from the Big Ol' Bomb.

Only the last person to press their button will win, so press it wisely!

CONTROLS:
  • Jump for player 1: W Key
  • Jump for player 2: Up Key
  • Move through tutorial prompts: Enter
CREDITS:

Design, Art, Sound, and Code: Michael Monty

Engine: Phaser

Most art/sound assets were re-used from a previous game idea I worked on last month but I didn't release it. I felt that the assets were a good fit for this game idea so I recycled them into the jam.
